## Exercise- Graphs Over Time 

Split into 6 groups, on the paper provided please draw a simple graph with time on the horizonal axis and level of the following variables on the verticle. 

<img src="https://cdn.rawgit.com/LZIM/teampsd/hexagon_icons/np_graph_87995_003F72.svg">

* Group 1: Morale
* Group 2: Turnover
* Group 3: Providers Trained in EBPs
* Group 4: Students in Clinic 
* Group 5: Provider Availability to start EBPs
* Group 6: No Shows
